body_html:
Hi,

I have not set this flag anywhere in my code - just using the default value for functional.upsample() and nn.Upsample(). As I understand the default behaviour is align_corners=False.

This is surprising!

body:
Hi,

I have not set this flag anywhere in my code - just using the default value for functional.upsample() and nn.Upsample(). As I understand the default behaviour is align_corners=False. 

This is surprising!
